snippet: Until Wednesday, there had been 21 consecutive federal court decisions finding gay marriage bans unconstitutional.
abstract: Federal Judge Martin L C Feldman upholds Louisiana's ban on same-sex marriage, going against what has been a unanimous trend of federal court decisions striking down such bans since 2013 Supreme Court ruling.
lead_paragraph: Until Wednesday, there had been 21 consecutive federal court decisions finding gay marriage bans unconstitutional.

headline.main: Federal Judge, Bucking Trend, Affirms Ban on Same-Sex Marriages in Louisiana
headline.print_headline: Federal Judge, Bucking Trend, Affirms Ban on Same-Sex Marriages in Louisiana

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
